# Security Policy

## Supported Versions

I am currently supporting the following versions of the
`django-admin-action-hero`:

| Version | Supported          |
|---------|--------------------|
| 0.1.x   | :white_check_mark: |

## Reporting a Vulnerability

Please report any security vulnerabilities privately via
[GitHub](https://github.com/kennethlove/django-admin-action-hero/security/advisories).
All security vulnerabilities will be promptly addressed.
